memories.content: LiteLLM analysis complete: Unified Python SDK for 100+ LLM providers with OpenAI-compatible API. Key features: async support with acompletion(), streaming with stream=True, unified interface across providers. Installation: pip install litellm. Perfect for Verba migration - can replace individual generator components with single LiteLLM interface supporting OpenAI, Anthropic, Azure, Ollama, HuggingFace, etc.
